item.title: 美国法院阻止拜登政府制定航空公司费用披露规则
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周二阻止了拜登政府 2024 年关于预先披露航空公司费用的规定，称交通部没有遵守程序规则。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Tuesday blocked the Biden administration's 2024 rule on upfront disclosure of airline fees, saying the Transportation Department had not complied with procedural rules.】

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普的所有关税威胁
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普一上任就发起了无数次关税威胁。这些威胁既包括广泛的威胁--对外国进口商品普遍征收关税，也包括针对特定行业、地区或特定国家的威胁，目的是让其他国家满足他的政策要求。【原文：Upon returning to office, U.S. President Donald Trump has launched numerous tariff threats. They range from broad ones - a universal tariff on foreign-imported goods - to ones aimed at specific sectors, regions, or at specific countries in an effort to get others to meet his policy demands.】

item.title: 英伟达期权因股价反弹吸引逢低买入者
item.description: 周一，人工智能领头羊英伟达（Nvidia）股价大幅下挫，但这丝毫没有影响期权交易员对这家芯片制造商股票的热情，随着周二英伟达股价回升，交易员们又迅速买入看涨英伟达的合约。【原文：Monday's massive selloff in AI-darling Nvidia's shares did little to blunt options traders' enthusiasm for the chipmaker's shares, with traders quick to pile back into bullish Nvidia contracts as the stock recovered on Tuesday.】

item.title: 空中客车公司为 2024 年的新太空冲锋打开大门
item.description: 本周二，空中客车公司（Airbus）表示，将在 2 月 20 日的年度业绩报告中向投资者介绍正在对一项主要卫星计划进行的审查的最新情况，这表明其陷入困境的太空部门可能会面临新的指控。【原文：Airbus signalled a potential new charge in its troubled space division on Tuesday, saying it would update investors on the ongoing review of a major satellite programme during annual results on Feb. 20.】

item.title: 官员称白宫正在评估中国人工智能应用 DeepSeek 对国家安全的影响
item.description: 白宫新闻秘书卡罗琳-利维特（Karoline Leavitt）周二表示，美国官员正在研究中国人工智能应用 DeepSeek 对国家安全的影响。【原文：U.S. officials are looking at the national security implications of the Chinese artificial intelligence app DeepSeek, White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 随着产量增加，Venture Global 获准在另一家液化天然气工厂引入天然气
item.description: 联邦监管机构周二批准 Venture Global LNG 向其位于路易斯安那州的 Plaquemines 工厂第七区块引入天然气，该公司将继续提高超冷天然气的产量。【原文：Federal regulators on Tuesday gave Venture Global LNG permission to introduce natural gas into the seventh block of its Plaquemines plant in Louisiana as the company continues to ramp up production of the superchilled gas.】

item.title: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司首席执行官表示将继续开放美国猪肉工厂，并在上市之际关注关税问题
item.description: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）首席执行官谢恩-史密斯（Shane Smith）周二表示，该公司不打算关闭更多的美国猪肉加工厂，该公司在被香港 WH 集团分拆十多年后重返美国交易所。【原文：Smithfield Foods does not plan to close more U.S. pork processing plants, Chief Executive Shane Smith said on Tuesday, as the company returned to a U.S. exchange after more than a decade in a spinoff by Hong Kong-based WH Group .】

item.title: LVMH 第四季度销售额增长 1%，超出预期
item.description: 周二，奢侈品行业的风向标路威酩轩集团（LVMH）第四季度销售额增长1%，超出预期，原因是节日期间对设计师时装和手袋的需求回升。【原文：Luxury bellwether LVMH beat expectations on Tuesday with a 1% rise in fourth-quarter sales as demand for designer fashion and handbags picked up over the holiday season, adding to hopes the sector has turned a corner.】

item.title: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司首次上市不温不火，估值 80 亿美元
item.description: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）周二股价上涨 1.5%，估值达 81 亿美元。【原文：Smithfield Foods was valued at $8.1 billion after its shares ticked up 1.5% on Tuesday, in a muted debut that might prompt other IPO candidates to tread cautiously.】

item.title: 宝马首席执行官提议将欧盟对美国进口汽车的关税降至 2.5%
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马公司首席执行官奥利弗-齐普斯（Oliver Zipse）周二表示，宝马将于本周提议欧盟将美国进口汽车的关税从10%降至2.5%，与美国现行的进口关税保持一致。【原文：BMW will propose this week that the European Union lower its tariff on U.S. car imports to 2.5% from 10%, in line with the current U.S. import tariff, the German automaker's CEO Oliver Zipse said on Tuesday.】

item.title: DeepSeek 恐慌之后，英伟达空头押注获利逾 60 亿美元
item.description: 在中国 DeepSeek 首次推出的低成本人工智能模型震惊华尔街之后，人工智能相关股票的卖空者获得了丰厚的利润，对英伟达的押注产生了创纪录的利润，总额超过 60 亿美元。【原文：Short sellers of artificial intelligence-related stocks raked in bumper profits after the smashing debut of low-cost AI models from China's DeepSeek spooked Wall Street, with bets against Nvidia yielding record profits totaling more than $6 billion.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Northvolt 要求股东在未来两年出资 13 亿美元
item.description: 两位熟悉此事的消息人士告诉路透社，Northvolt 在本月的一次会议上要求 100 多名股东在未来两年内提供 12.9 亿美元，以帮助这家破产的瑞典电池制造商恢复业务。【原文：Northvolt asked more than 100 shareholders at a meeting this month to provide $1.29 billion over the next two years to help restore the bankrupt Swedish battery maker's business, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: LVMH 第四季度销售额增长 1%，超出预期
item.description: 周二，奢侈品行业的风向标路威酩轩集团（LVMH）第四季度销售额增长1%，超出预期，原因是节日期间对设计师时装和手袋的需求回升。【原文：Luxury bellwether LVMH beat expectations on Tuesday with a 1% rise in fourth-quarter sales as demand for designer fashion and handbags picked up over the holiday season, adding to hopes the sector has turned a corner.】

item.title: 特朗普的数字美元禁令让中国和欧洲的 CBDC 脱缰而去
item.description: 观察家们认为，唐纳德-特朗普迅速禁止 "数字美元 "的举动为中国和欧洲提供了广阔的空间，使其已经取得进展的中央银行数字货币（CBDC）原型成为全球标准制定者。【原文：Donald Trump's rapid move to ban a "digital dollar" has left the field wide open, observers say, for China and Europe to make their already-advanced central bank digital currency (CBDC) prototypes into global standard-setters.】

item.title: 政府称 2024 年美国工会会员人数变化不大
item.description: 周二的一份政府报告称，2024 年的工会会员人数略有下降，因为政府工作人员在有组织的劳工队伍中保持着较高的代表性。【原文：Union membership levels dipped ever so slightly in 2024 as government workers maintained outsized representation in the ranks of organized labor, a government report Tuesday said.】

item.title: 汽车技术公司 CDK 就美国经销商数据案达成 6.3 亿美元和解协议
item.description: 汽车技术巨头 CDK Global 已同意支付 6.3 亿美元，以了结反垄断索赔，该公司通过限制访问权，导致数百家软件供应商为汽车经销商数据多付了费用。【原文：Automotive technology giant CDK Global has agreed to pay $630 million to settle antitrust claims that it caused hundreds of software vendors to overpay for vehicle dealership data by restricting access.】

item.title: 1 月份美国消费者信心进一步恶化
item.description: 由于对劳动力市场和通货膨胀的担忧再度升温，1月份美国消费者信心连续第二个月走弱。【原文：U.S. consumer confidence weakened for a second straight month in January amid renewed concerns about the labor market and inflation.】

item.title: 美国科技股大幅下挫一天后微幅走低，美元反弹
item.description: 科技股周二微幅走低，芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）早盘下跌 2%，一天前该公司曾遭遇历史上最大的单日市值损失，不过交易员们确实将避险货币转回美元。【原文：Tech stocks nudged lower on Tuesday with chipmaker Nvidia falling 2% in early trade, a day after it suffered the biggest one-day market capitalisation loss in history, though traders did shift back out of safe-haven currencies into the dollar.】

item.title: 美国科技和关税冲击引发市场争相寻找新的避风港
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税威胁引发的科技股溃败和美元波动使市场陷入低迷，投资者正纷纷涌入从日元到欧洲信贷等资产，这些资产可以作为动荡的缓冲。【原文：As a tech stock rout and U.S. dollar swings driven by President Donald Trump's tariff threats send markets into a tailspin, investors are piling into assets from Japan's yen to European credit that could act as a buffer to the turbulence.】

item.title: 银行贷款前景是决策者在美联储会议上的重要参考因素之一
item.description: 本周二开始的为期两天的美联储政策会议可能会审议信贷数据，这些数据可能会显示，尽管经济环境高度不确定以及与央行政策挂钩的借贷成本仍然令人担忧，但银行增加贷款的前景依然复杂。【原文：Credit data likely to be considered at a two-day Federal Reserve policy meeting that begins on Tuesday may show pumps primed for increased bank lending, even as the prospect for gains is complicated by a highly uncertain economic environment and still-daunting borrowing costs tied to central bank policy.】

item.title: 在人工智能竞争日趋激烈之际，OpenAI 面向美国政府机构推出 ChatGPT Gov
item.description: 微软支持的人工智能（AI）风向标 OpenAI 周二在一篇博客文章中表示，该公司已推出 ChatGPT Gov，这是专为美国政府机构量身定制的 ChatGPT 版本。【原文：Microsoft -backed artificial intelligence (AI) bellwether OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Gov, a tailored version of ChatGPT designed for U.S. government agencies, it said in a blog post on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，X 与 Visa 达成支付协议，向马斯克的 "一切应用 "目标迈进
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周二告诉路透社，支付巨头 Visa 和埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司正在合作，为社交媒体应用程序的客户提供直接支付解决方案。【原文：Payments giant Visa and Elon Musk's X are partnering to offer direct payment solutions to customers of the social media app, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 桥水认为科技股短期调整，但看好 DeepSeek 的影响
item.description: 对冲基金经理桥水联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）表示，中国初创公司DeepSeek推出最新人工智能（AI）模型，可能会导致许多科技公司股价出现短期回调，但对整个行业来说是积极的。【原文：Hedge fund manager Bridgewater Associates said Chinese startup DeepSeek's launch of its latest artificial intelligence (AI) models could lead to a short-term correction in many tech companies' share prices but is positive for the industry.】

item.title: 苹果公司在反垄断上诉中没有得到德国法官的同情
item.description: 德国联邦法官周二表示，他们可能会在与苹果公司的法律战中支持德国反垄断监管机构，此前他们就美国科技巨头是否应受到额外管制的问题进行了三个多小时的审议。【原文：German federal judges indicated on Tuesday that they could back the country's antitrust regulator in a legal battle with Apple , following over three hours of deliberations over whether the U.S. tech giant should be subject to additional controls.】

item.title: 食品供应商 Sysco 保持全年预期不变，尽管季度业绩有所增长
item.description: 包装食品和生鲜食品供应商 Sysco 周二维持其全年销售额和利润预期不变，尽管第二季度收入超出预期，原因是餐馆需求的复苏仍不均衡。【原文：Packaged and fresh food supplier Sysco on Tuesday kept its full-year sales and profit forecasts unchanged despite beating estimates for second-quarter revenue, as a recovery in demand from restaurants remains uneven.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空股价在单位收益和成本预测令人失望后下挫
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）周二预测，第一季度成本上升，单位收入低于分析师预期，导致这家总部位于纽约的航空公司股价在早盘交易中下跌 14%。【原文：JetBlue Airways forecast higher costs and unit revenue below analysts' expectations for the first quarter on Tuesday, sending the New York-based carrier's shares down 14% in morning trade.】

item.title: 贝恩资本拟收购 Surgery Partners 剩余股份
item.description: 本周二的一份文件显示，贝恩资本私募股权公司（Bain Capital Private Equity）提议以每股 25.75 美元的价格收购其尚未持有的外科设施运营商 Surgery Partners 的剩余股份。【原文：Bain Capital Private Equity has proposed to acquire the remaining shares of surgical facility operator Surgery Partners it does not already own for $25.75 apiece, a filing showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官表示不担心特朗普的关税威胁
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）周二表示，他对特朗普政府威胁对贸易伙伴征收关税 "并不太担心"，其中包括作为波音公司遥远供应链重要组成部分的国家。【原文：Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg said on Tuesday he is "not too worried" about the Trump administration's threats to impose tariffs on trade partners, including countries that are important parts of Boeing’s far-flung supply chain.】

item.title: 雪佛龙与 1 号引擎、GE Vernova 合作，为美国数据中心提供动力
item.description: 能源巨头雪佛龙公司（Chevron）周二表示，该公司已与投资公司 Engine No.【原文：Energy major Chevron said on Tuesday it has signed an agreement with investment firm Engine No. 1 and GE Vernova to build natural gas-based power plants to run co-located data centers in the U.S.】

item.title: 星巴克北美总裁卸任
item.description: 星巴克周二表示，其北美总裁萨拉-特里林（Sara Trilling）将在任职近三年后卸任。【原文：Starbucks said on Tuesday its North American president Sara Trilling would be stepping down after nearly three years at the role.】
